name: ChooCycling
description:
ChooCycling - A Mini Jam #102 entry.

Death is not the end for recyclable things! Let's pick them up with a steam train and get them to the recycling centre.

All the controls are handled by mouse input.
Be careful not to blow up the locomotive. If it's running too hot: add some water
If the pressure is too high: press the OOPS! button to vent some pressure from the boiler.

Hope you can... blow off some steam in this game.
